(2,): As a user, I want to create a new submission, so that I can track my file uploads As a user, I want to update the publish status of my submission, so that I can reflect its current state (draft, published, etc.) As a system, I want to update file metadata, so that I can track file changes over time As a user, I want to track validation errors for my submissions, so that I can resolve them before finalizing
(4,): As a system, I want to validate submissions, so that I can detect and log errors in file formats As a tester, I want to generate a user testing report, so that I can analyze usability issues and recommendations As a developer, I want to log system activities, so that I can troubleshoot issues efficiently
(0,): As a user, I want to view published files by type, so that I can access the latest approved data
(1,): As a system, I want to process deletions for a given date, so that I can clean up old or invalid data
(3,): As a system, I want to sync FPDS data, so that it aligns with D1 file generation
